title: #243 - Ari Shaffir, Big Jay Oakerson, Tony Hinchcliffe, & ME
description:
Comedians Ari Shaffir, Big Jay Oakerson, & Tony Hinchcliffe stop by the Mancave to talk about Ari's New Netflix Special DOUBLE NEGATIVE streaming NOW on Netflix, we get drunk, we smoke, I explain to Ari the "Ari vs. LeeAnn Instagram Comment Feud", and we play game where we say how much money we are getting paid, playing the same venue.

This Podcast is brought to you by BEACHBODY ON DEMAND - to claim a free trail membership TEXT [Bert] to 303030 and get full access to this entire platform for free!

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

 

To Follow me on..

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
